p: The herbal extracts were produced by maceration. The extraction took place in glass and stainless-steel containers. Fresh rose petals were dried for 1 day and 2 kg of plant material were extracted for 35 days, at a temperature of 22−27 °C, in 40 L of water containing 15% v/ v ethanol. Fresh geranium leaves were dried for 8 h and then 0.2 kg of plant material were extracted for 30 days, at a temperature of 22−27 °C, in 40 L of 38% v/ v aqueous ethanol.
